Key Match Events: Jalen Suggs left the game in the second quarter with back spasms, and was ruled out for the rest of the game
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley said Suggs was in a lot of pain and would be re-evaluated tomorrow
Magic players and coaches are trying to keep Suggs' spirits high and are hoping he will overcome his injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic are already down several key players due to injuries, including Paolo Banchero and Franz Wagner
Others: Suggs' injury is a crucial development for the Orlando Magic, who are already struggling with a depleted roster
